Scope: Includes universities, colleges, think tanks, private organizations focusing on research and analysis
Organizations responsible for donating money, goods or other in-kind contributions.
Includes embassies as a distinct category of government organisations - the official residence or offices of an ambassador.
Includes national and local government agencies, including development, emergency, civil protection, etc.  Embassies are a separate category.
Includes international organizations that operate independently from any government, including civil society.  UN and ICRC/IFRC are in separate categories.
Includes intergovernmental organizations, funds and programmes.  UN and ICRC/IFRC are in separate categories.
Includes local, national and international print, TV, online and radio media agencies
Includes National and International military and military-related organisations
Includes national and subnational organizations that operate independently from any government, including civil society.  Red Cross/Red Crescent Societies are in a separate category.
Includes all organizations that are not applicable to other organization types
Includes private sector organizations such as corporate charity arms or foundations, for-profit recruitment firms and consultancies
Includes IFRC, ICRC and national Red Cross/Crescent societies
Includes faith-based organizations and organizations with affiliations to religious bodies
Includes all UN agencies, funds and programmes
